message: This is our first product. We're excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a premium item. We're not at liberty to disclose the details, but rest assured that this product has the potential to be a great addition to your collection. The price is $10000. What do you say?
I'd like to take a chance on this product. I understand it's a risk, but I'm willing to take it. I'll buy the product.

You're our second buyer! We've had a single sale so far, and unfortunately, it was a bit of a... learning experience. Let's just say that our previous customer is still trying to figure out what to do with their purchase. We're confident that our next product will be a much better fit for you. The price remains $10000. Are you interested in taking a look?

I'm willing to take a chance on your product, but I want to make it clear that I'm doing so with a 50% chance of getting a high-quality product. I'm hoping that your learning experience with the previous customer will improve the quality of the product I receive.

We appreciate your honesty and willingness to take a chance on our product! Unfortunately, it seems like we're experiencing a bit of a streak. Two low-quality products in a row isn't ideal, but we're not giving up yet. Let's just say that we're re-evaluating our quality control processes. I'm willing to take a chance on your product, but I appreciate the no-questions-asked return policy. I'll take a closer look at the product and get back to you with my final decision.
